snippet: Martha Sias had no idea what she was producing before she was laid off from her high-security job as an assembler of military aircraft parts for the Lockheed Corporation, but she says she was very good at it.   "You have your blueprints here; you ...
lead_paragraph: Martha Sias had no idea what she was producing before she was laid off from her high-security job as an assembler of military aircraft parts for the Lockheed Corporation, but she says she was very good at it. "You have your blueprints here; you have your parts here," she said. "You sit in a little cubicle, and you're making that one part. What it goes to, where it goes to, they don't tell you."

headline.main: Displaced Aerospace Workers Face Grim Future in California Economy
